```{r load packages}
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)

library(ggthemes)

library(stringr)
```

```{r list files}
list.files("../Data/")
```

```{r read in data}
homicides <- read.csv("../Data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r new column}
homicides2 <- homicides %>% 
  unite(city_name, city, state, sep = ", ")
```

```{r unslolved data frame}
unsolved <- homicides %>% 
  select(city, disposition) %>% 
  mutate(solved = disposition == "Closed by arrest") %>% 
  group_by(city) %>% 
  summarize(n_homicides = n(), n_unsolved = sum(solved))
```
